definition: gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi

sentences.english: A: What's up with the new air conditioner?
sentences.chinese: 這臺新冷氣機是怎麼回事？

sentences.english: Why are air-conditioners usually placed near the ceiling?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼冷氣機通常都要裝在天花板上？

sentences.english: Before how to carry on the air conditioner first movement the maintenance?
sentences.chinese: 如何進行冷氣機第一次運行前的保養工作？

sentences.english: We should use fans more often instead of air-conditioners when the weather is hot.
sentences.chinese: 當天氣炎熱時，我們應該用風扇來代替冷氣機。

sentences.english: Keep air-conditioners well maintained and wash air filters frequently.
sentences.chinese: 冷氣機要定期維修保養，隔塵網要經常清洗。

sentences.english: The chapel's air conditioning needs maintenance.
sentences.chinese: 教堂的冷氣機需要保養。

sentences.english: Sales of air conditioners are up this month.
sentences.chinese: 本月冷氣機的銷售額增加了。

sentences.english: They bought a new air conditioner.
sentences.chinese: 他們買了一臺新的冷氣機。

sentences.english: We had to replace the air- conditioners when we moved in.
sentences.chinese: 我們搬進來的時候得將冷氣機汰換掉。

sentences.english: Our air-conditioner has been making a noise since yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 我們的冷氣機從昨天起就一直髮出雜音。

sentences.english: Clean or replace filters on your furnace and air conditioner.
sentences.chinese: 清洗或換掉暖爐及冷氣機的空氣濾清器。

sentences.english: I won't buy their air-conditioner if they hadn't guaranteed a refund.
sentences.chinese: 如果當初沒有退錢保證，我不會買那臺冷氣機。

sentences.english: For saving money, she turned off the air -conditioner.
sentences.chinese: 請你將冷氣機開大一點好嗎？

definition: to overhaul/to examine and fix (a motor)/to service (a vehicle)
pipeline/general term for pipes, cables etc
aerial work platform (e.g. cherry picker or scissor lift)/lift/elevator
